General Instructions for ths JCorrespondence Component!

  • AFTER THE PACKAGE's INSTALLATION, GO TO CATEGORIES TAB AND CREATE CATEGORIES FOR YOUR CORRESPONDENCES.
  • IF YOU DO NOT HAVE USERS WITH ADMINISTRATOR OR SUPER USER PRIVILEGES CREATE ONE.
  • GO TO CORRESPONDENCES TAB AND CREATE NEW CORRESPONDENCE, THEN SELECT THE USERS YOU WANT TO SENT THE MESSAGE TO.
  • IF YOU WANT TO EDIT A CORRESPONDENCE , SELECT THE APPROPRIATE CORRESPONDENCE AND PRESS EDIT. AFTER THE EDIT SELECT THE USERS YOU WANT TO SENT THE MESSAGE TO.
  • IF YOU WANT TO SEE THE INBOX PRESS THE INBOX BUTTON.
  • IF YOU WANT TO SEE THE OUTBOX PRESS THE OUTBOX BUTTON.
  • IF YOU WANT TO SEE OR REPLY TO A MESSAGE PRESS THE LINK TO THE MESSAGE TITLE OR SELECT THE MESSAGE AND PRESSS THE REPLY BUTTON.
  • ON THE REPLY SCREEN ADD YOUR MESSAGE AND PRESS REPLY, THEN SELECT THE USERS YOU WANT TO SENT THE MESSAGE TO.
  • YOU MAY SEARCH FOR THE APPROPRIATE CORRESPONDENCE EITHER BY TITLE OR BY MESSAGE BODY.
  • AT ANY TIME YOU MAY CANCEL THE WHOLE OPERATION BY PRESSING THE CANCEL BUTTON.
